docstring.long_description:
Use the OUTPUT_2450 block to turn the output on or off.

Requires a CONNECT_2450 block to create the connection.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_2450 block).

parameters.name: function
parameters.description: The type of output to use.

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The fixed voltage or current to output.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Output limit (if function=voltage, current is limited and visa versa).
